Dominion [startdom]: 1

The Onmyo Hakase claims to be the inventor of Onmyo astrology. He arrived with the first men to the land of the Bakemono and brought with him an ancient an powerful magical tradition. Sequestered in his mountain home for centuries he has emerged again to take the role of a Pretender God.
